answerText: Sierra Nevada [10] This famous, oft-photographed granite formation in Yosemite is named for its distinctive shape. Hikers must now obtain a permit to hike up the cable route due to its popularity among hikers.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Delaware + Michigan A  | 16 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Answer the following about Yosemite National Park, for 10 points each. [10] Yosemite is located within this mountain range in Western California. This mountain range is home to Mount Whitney, this highest point in the contiguous 48 states.
